plugins.name: Color Code Extractor
plugins.description:
Color Code Extractor helps you identify and extract all color codes used in your selected Figma frames, making it easier to maintain design consistency and build design systems.


✨ FEATURES:


• Extract all color codes from selected frames, groups, or individual nodes


• View colors in a visual grid with hex codes for easy reference


• Copy any color code to clipboard with a single click


• Handles both fill and stroke colors automatically


• Supports opacity/alpha channel in color codes


• Works with multiple selections simultaneously


🎯 PERFECT FOR:


• Design system documentation


• Creating color palettes from existing designs


• Ensuring color consistency across projects


• Handoff to developers


• Auditing designs for color usage


Simply select any frame, group, or node in your design, run the plugin, and instantly see all colors used. No more manually inspecting elements or guessing which colors are being used where!


Color Code Extractor is lightweight, fast, and works entirely within Figma - no external services required.

plugins.name: FrameSwapper | Frame to Component
plugins.description:
✨Overview

FrameSwapper is a powerful Figma plugin that helps you replace multiple frames with the same name with a selected component. Perfect for design system implementation and large-scale design updates.


✨ Key Features

  1. 🔍 Smart frame detection: Automatically finds all frames with the same name
  2. 🖼️ Visual preview: Shows thumbnails of both frames and components
  3. ⚡ Batch replacement: Replace multiple frames at once
  4. 🎨 Component integrity: Maintains original component dimensions and properties
  5. 🔎 Search functionality: Quickly find components by name
  6. 📱 Clean UI: Modern, intuitive interface


🛠️ How It Works

  1. Select any frame in your design
  2. Click "Find Matching Frames" to detect similar frames
  3. Choose which frames to replace (or use "Select All")
  4. Pick a component from the available list
  5. Click "Replace" to transform your frames


💡 Use Cases

  1. Implementing design system components across multiple frames
  2. Updating old designs with new component versions
  3. Standardizing repeated elements across your design
  4. Converting prototype frames into component instances


🆕 Version 1.0.0 Updates

  1. Initial release with core functionality
  2. Smart component replacement system
  3. Visual preview system
  4. Search and filter capabilities
  5. Batch selection and replacement
  6. Modern, user-friendly interface


💡Resources & Links

📝 [Feedback Form](https://forms.gle/goMQSobvFav6Unjy9)


❤️Plugin & UXUI Designer

Cupi Ng

plugins.name: Bulletproof Icons
plugins.description:
🎯 Bulletproof icons


A simple figma plugin to quickly create what I call "Bulletproof" icons for your icon libraries.


Tired of readjusting your icon component layers, so that they don't break in your design? Using different icon from different icon libraries? This plugin will solve the problem of creating consistent icon components.


What does it do?

This plugin will make layer structure for all of your icon like this:


Frame/

├── Union

│ ├──Vector

├── Original


So, when you change color of your icon, resize it or do any other modification, and then change the icon component to another one your modifications won't reset or break. They will be consistent no matter what you do.


How to use?

It's so simple! There's no UI, just select one or multiple frames (not vectors) and run the plugin.

accepted.name: Əlisa Musayev
accepted.description:
Instagram: zoomxrist
Telegram: zoomxrist
mail: alisamusa.ms@gmail.com

plugins.tagline: Create consistent, scalable icons that maintain their quality across different sizes and use cases.

plugins.name: deeepSpace
plugins.description:
deeepSpace Plugin (Beta) – Bring Your Design System to Life 🚀


Transform your design systems into scalable, production-ready code with the deeepSpace Figma Plugin (Beta). Designed for creators and builders who prioritize scalability, efficiency, and speed, deeepSpace makes it effortless to bridge the gap between design and development without unnecessary complexity.


What Makes deeepSpace Awesome?


🚀 Unmatched Speed: Push your design system to deeepSpace in just seconds. It’s so fast, you’ll wonder how you worked without it!


💡 Design-System-First: Forget bulky page-level exports. We focus exclusively on your design system to ensure your components are scalable, reusable, and developer-ready.


🛠️ Developer-Centric Code: No messy, bloated output – just clean, structured code that your dev team will love. Minimal edits required!


📦 Complete Workflow Integration: From the Figma Plugin to the deeepCLI and web interface, our tools work together seamlessly to keep your projects and design systems organized.


Beta Features:


This is our beta version, and we’re constantly improving! Try it now and help us shape the future of design-to-code workflows. Your feedback will directly influence the next steps of deeepSpace’s evolution.


How It Works:


1.Design your system in Figma.

2.Use the suuuuper fast deeepSpace Plugin (Beta) to push it to your workspace.

3.Generate and pull production-ready code with the deeepCLI.


Effortlessly manage your design system and projects through the deeepSpace web interface. Collaborate, track progress, and keep everything organized in one place.


Join our beta and help build scalable products faster than ever with deeepSpace! 🎉
plugins.tagline: “deeepSpace Figma Plugin – Supercharge Your Design System to Code Workflow, Faster Than Ever! 🚀”

plugins.name: Athlon TOC
plugins.description:
Navigate Your Figma Projects Like Never Before


A tool to streamline your design workflow. This powerful plugin automatically generates a detailed table of contents for your Figma files, making navigation through complex projects a breeze.


Features and Benefits:


Automatic Detection: The tool scans your Figma file and automatically identifies all sections and frames, organizing them into a clear, concise table of contents.


Clickable Links: Each entry in the table of contents is a clickable link, allowing you to jump directly to the relevant section or frame. No more scrolling through endless layers to find what you need!


Dynamic Updates: As your project evolves, rerunning the tool dynamically updates the table of contents to reflect changes, ensuring that you always have an up-to-date overview.


Vertical Auto-Layout: The table of contents is presented in a neatly organized vertical auto-layout frame, providing a clear and structured overview of your document.


Customizable Layout: While the tool takes care of the heavy lifting, you retain full control over the layout and presentation of your table of contents, ensuring it complements your design process.


Easy to Use:

Simply install the plugin, run it within your Figma file, and watch as it transforms your workflow, saving you time and effort.
plugins.tagline: Navigate with Ease: Instant Table of Contents for Your Figma Files

plugins.name: ASCII Art Generator
plugins.description:
Bring old-school, retro ASCII magic straight into Figma with the ASCII Art Generator plugin! Turn any image—portraits, logos, icons—into radiant text-based artwork inspired by classic terminal visuals.


  1. Subscription via plugin or one-time payment license
  2. Get one-time-payment lifetime license here ->


Key Features

Live Image Import

Upload any image (JPG/PNG) or paste a URL and instantly see it in ASCII form.


Full Adjustment Controls

• Brightness, Contrast & Blur sliders

• Invert toggle for negative‐style art


Rich Dithering Options

• Floyd–Steinberg, Atkinson, Ordered Bayer & Noise dithering

• Toggle “Ignore White” to preserve whitespace


Multiple Character Sets

• Standard (@%#*+=-:.)

• Block (█▓▒░)

• Binary (0/1), Hex (0–F)

• Custom “Manual” character

• Ultra-detailed glyph palette


Edge-Detection Modes

• Sobel outline for high-contrast edges

• Difference-of-Gaussians “DOG” contour style


Flexible Output Formats (Pro)

• Editable text node in Figma (pro)

• PNG export

• SVG code insert (pro) Vector outline (path-based)


Seamless Insertion

One-click “Insert” drops your ASCII art into the canvas, centered and ready to tweak.


Copy & Share

Copy pure ASCII text to clipboard or export vector/SVG code for use elsewhere.


Free Trial & License

• 2 free insertions under trial (PNG)

• Easy upgrade flow via in-plugin “Upgrade” (current user) or “Activate License” (1 or multiple one-time-payment) buttons

• Usage counter and “mouse-follower” overlay when trial ends

For support, reach out to help at knapsack dot cloud

plugins.name: Samenamer
plugins.description: This Figma plugin allows you to select and color all frames on the current page that share the same name as the frame you have currently selected. After selecting a frame, the plugin will scan the page for other frames with the same name and select them automatically. The selected frames will then be colored red to make them stand out. This can be useful for quickly identifying and grouping related design elements within a Figma file.

plugins.name: Chameleon
plugins.description:
🦎 CHAMELEON


Chameleon is a Figma plugin that turns color token management into a breeze. Build smart palettes, structure tokens, and export directly into native Figma Variables.



🎨 KEY FEATURES


🎨 Smart palette generation — create harmonious color ramps from a single base color


🌒 Auto dark theme — instantly generate dark versions of your palettes


♿ A11Y mode — contrast-optimized palettes that meet WCAG accessibility standards


🧷 Figma Variables export — full support for collections, modes, and cross-collection aliases


📤 JSON import/export — compatible with Figma Variables and Token Studio


✏️ Flexible structure — rename shades, palettes, collections, and modes while preserving links



🌒 AUTO DARK THEME


Instantly generate perceptually balanced dark palettes based on your light theme.


How it works:

  1. Inverts brightness scale: lightest shade (50) becomes darkest, darkest (900) becomes lightest
  2. Base color remains at position 500
  3. Brightness follows a perceptual (non-linear) scale
  4. Saturation is increased for dark shades, reduced for light ones
  5. Additional correction ensures visual harmony



🎨 BASE MODE


Best for:

  1. Creating aesthetic palettes without strict contrast rules
  2. Branding and accent color systems
  3. Visually balanced UIs with emphasis on artistic control


Generation logic:

  1. Base color is placed at center (shade 500)
  2. Builds out lighter (50–400) and darker (600–900) shades
  3. Brightness and saturation adjust relative to the base



♿ A11Y MODE


Palettes generated with perceptual brightness, ensuring strong contrast between shades.


Best for:

  1. Interfaces requiring WCAG compliance
  2. Government, medical, educational and fintech products
  3. Inclusive design for wide audiences


Generation logic:

  1. Builds a scale of perceived brightness
  2. Base color is positioned where its brightness fits best
  3. Shades are calibrated for target contrast
  4. Contrast between neighbors ≥ 1.3:1



📌 HOW TO USE


  1. Create your base palettes in the "Global" tab (5 to 15 shades)
  2. Enable A11Y mode if needed
  3. Switch between light and dark themes to evaluate the result
  4. Export everything to Figma Variables or JSON
  5. Youtube



⚙️ UINDER YHE HOOD


  1. HSL-based ramp generation
  2. Edge brightness: Light — 95% → 20%, Dark — 15% → 85%
  3. Auto positioning of base color (especially in A11Y mode)
  4. Built-in WCAG contrast checker
  5. Visual base marker (★)
  6. Full support for Figma Variables & Token Studio structure



🚧 STATUS


This plugin is in beta. We welcome feedback and are actively improving it.
plugins.tagline: Color token generator with automatic shade scales and Figma Variables export

plugins.name: Dynamo
plugins.description:
Effortlessly increase design quality and accessibility


  1. Live preview Dynamic Type in real time
  2. Spot where text needs to wrap or truncate
  3. Add your scaled designs to the canvas with a click
  4. Saves you a ton of time


What's Dynamic Type?


Many users set a text size other than the default in order to read content more comfortably. Supporting Dynamic Type and larger text sizes is an important accessibility requirement. Dynamo scales text layers in your designs to test how they handle larger text sizes. Making it much easier to increase the quality, robustness, and inclusivity of your designs.


For best results


  1. Use auto layout in your designs so that layouts remain in tact once text layers have scaled
  2. To ignore a text layer, prepend its name with a period


Please leave comments and feedback below.

accepted.name: Mike
accepted.description:
Premium app design for startups.
Tools to level up designers.

plugins.tagline: Live Dynamic Type Preview

plugins.name: GPT To I18n
plugins.description:
GptToI18n是一款非常实用的插件工具！它不仅能够轻松地的一键生成i18n，还可以将设计稿瞬间转化为多种语言版本，让您轻松应对全球市场。




一键生成i18n json。这意味着您可以在不需要编写任何代码的情况下，自动将设计稿翻译成其他语言。这不仅可以节省您的时间和精力，还能提高工作效率。




我们推荐在草稿状态下完成，您只需要按住 ctrl + p 打开GptToI18n插件，选择您需要转换的范围和目标语言，然后点击获取JSON，只需要等待几秒就能完成 i18n JSON生成。可以看到的 Text name 也做了对应处理。




如果您需要将设计稿转换成目标语言版本，您只需要点击根据 JSON 翻译页面即可。




一键将设计稿转化为各种语言的版本。无论您的客户在世界的哪个角落，他们只需要打开您的设计稿，就可以立即理解您的产品。




当然，如果您没有输入OpenAi API 密钥，获取对应 JSON 需要消耗 tokens ，如果您有自己的OpenAi API 密钥，那么您可以尽情的使用。




所以，如果您是一个善于尝试新工具的人，那么GptToi18n绝对是一个不容错过的好选择。它不仅可以帮助您节省时间和精力，提高工作效率，还可以让您的产品更轻松地走进全球市场。快来试试吧，让它为您的工作带来更多的便利和成功！


GptToI18n is a very useful plugin tool! Not only can it easily generate i18n with one click, but it can also instantly convert designs into multiple language versions, so that you can easily respond to the global market.


Generate i18n json in one click. This means that you can automatically translate your designs into other languages without having to write any code. This will not only save you time and effort, but also improve your productivity.


We recommend that you finish in draft state, you just need to hold down ctrl + p to open the GptToI18n plugin, select the scope and target language you want to convert, and then click Get JSON, only need to wait a few seconds to complete the i18n JSON generation. The Text name that can be seen is also processed.


If you need to convert your design to the target language version, just click Translate Page from JSON.


Convert design drafts into various languages with one click. No matter where your customers are in the world, they just need to open your design manuscript and instantly understand your product.


Of course, if you do not enter the OpenAi API key, it will cost tokens to get the corresponding JSON, and if you have your own OpenAi API key, then you can use it as much as you like.


So, if you are someone who is good at trying out new tools, then GptToi18n is definitely a good choice not to be missed. It can not only help you save time and effort, improve work efficiency, but also make it easier for your products to enter the global market. Give it a try and let it bring more convenience and success to your work!

plugins.name: TypeGrid
plugins.description:
TypeGrid allows you to:

  1. Generate a typescale: Choose your base font size, ratio, and number of steps, and the plugin instantly creates a preview of your typescale.
  2. Apply a baseline grid: Set your baseline unit and rounding mode, and the plugin ensures your text layers align perfectly to the grid.
  3. Create text layers: With a single click, generate text layers for each step in your typescale, automatically named and styled.
  4. Create text styles: Generate Figma text styles for each step in your typescale, making it easy to apply consistent typography throughout your design.
  5. Preview with custom fonts: See how your typescale looks with any font installed on your system, including different weights.

136620.name: TypeGrid
136620.description:
TypeGrid allows you to:

  1. Generate a typescale: Choose your base font size, ratio, and number of steps, and the plugin instantly creates a preview of your typescale.
  2. Apply a baseline grid: Set your baseline unit and rounding mode, and the plugin ensures your text layers align perfectly to the grid.
  3. Create text layers: With a single click, generate text layers for each step in your typescale, automatically named and styled.
  4. Create text styles: Generate Figma text styles for each step in your typescale, making it easy to apply consistent typography throughout your design.
  5. Preview with custom fonts: See how your typescale looks with any font installed on your system, including different weights.
  6. Fine-tune your settings: Adjust your typescale and baseline grid settings in real-time to get the perfect look for your design.
  7. Save time and ensure consistency: Automate the tedious process of creating and managing typescales and baseline grids, saving you time and ensuring consistency across your designs.

plugins.name: Stroke Manager
plugins.description:
Stroke Manager is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you efficiently manage stroke properties across multiple elements simultaneously. Perfect for designers who work with illustrations, icons, wireframes, or any vector content.


Key Features


  1. Batch Update Strokes: Modify stroke width, alignment, and end caps across multiple elements at once
  2. Smart Color Management: Map colors individually or override all strokes with a single color
  3. End Point Styling: Quickly apply different cap styles (round, square, arrow)
  4. Nested Elements: Apply changes to parent elements and all their children with a single click
  5. Color Detection: Intelligently groups similar colors to simplify your workflow


Why You'll Love It

Save valuable time by updating dozens or hundreds of stroke properties in seconds instead of tediously modifying each element individually. Stroke Manager is particularly useful when adapting illustrations for different sizes or contexts, ensuring consistent stroke weights and styles throughout your design.

Perfect for design system maintenance, icon libraries, and illustration collections, Stroke Manager helps you maintain visual consistency while dramatically speeding up your workflow.
plugins.tagline: Batch Update Strokes

plugins.name: Figma to Celtra
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with the "Figma to Celtra" integration! Effortlessly import your stunning Figma designs into Celtra's design workspace and unlock the power of creative automation.


Key Features:

  1. Streamlined Workflow: Continue your pre-production processes and create conceptual designs in Figma, then drop them into Celtra with ease for a cohesive and efficient design experience.
  2. Efficient Importing: Easily transition your designs from Figma to Celtra using a simple copy and paste function. Whether you're working with single layers or multiple artboards, the process is quick and hassle-free.
  3. Layer Mapping: Experience seamless compatibility as all layer types from Figma are mapped to their corresponding layers in Celtra. Make configurations effortlessly for Images, Text, Shapes, and Groups right after you import.


Once your designs are in Celtra, take advantage of creative automation to scale your content across various sizes and design variations without missing a beat. Upgrade your design collaboration and scaling capabilities today by using "Figma to Celtra", and take the first step toward a more streamlined creative workflow.


Note that this plugin is compatible only with design files created in Celtra's Creative Automation platform.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Design Integration

plugins.name: Chroma UI
plugins.description:
Chroma UI revolutionizes color selection by combining the power of perceptually uniform OKLCH color space with an intuitive interface. Create stunning, accessible palettes that elevate your designs and streamline your workflow.


Create with Confidence

Make color decisions faster with intelligent tools that understand both aesthetics and accessibility. Every palette you generate comes with semantic color naming and WCAG-compliant text color recommendations, helping you build cohesive design systems that scale beautifully.


Professional-Grade Control

  1. Precisely adjust colors using the perceptually uniform OKLCH space, with familiar HEX, RGB, and HSL options
  2. Create smooth, mathematically accurate gradients that maintain consistent luminance
  3. Generate context-aware color names that adapt to your design system
  4. Ensure accessibility with automatic contrast checking and text color suggestions
  5. Export palettes directly to your design tools and documentation
  6. Spark inspiration with curated random palettes based on color theory principles


Essential For

🎨 Design Systems – Build scalable, consistent color foundations

🎯 Brand Identity – Craft memorable, on-brand color palettes

📦 UI Components – Ensure color harmony across your interfaces

📱 Digital Products – Create accessible, high-impact user experiences

💡 Creative Exploration – Experiment with unique, dynamic color schemes


Experience the next evolution in color tools. Chroma UI combines mathematical precision with designer-friendly workflows to help you create better color systems in less time.


Crafted for professional designers and teams who need scientific accuracy without sacrificing creative flexibility. Upgrade your color workflow today with Chroma UI.

plugins.name: Quick Rename
plugins.description:
Automatically renames frames and components in Figma based on their auto-layout properties. It helps designers maintain consistent and meaningful layer naming conventions, making it easier to understand the structure and purpose of elements in complex designs.


Key features


  1. Renames frames with auto-layout to "Column", "Row", or "Wrap" based on their layout mode
  2. Labels frames without auto-layout as "Container"
  3. Identifies frames containing text as "Content"
  4. Rename all shapes as "Vector"
  5. Preserves naming for component instances
  6. Reset text layers names


Benefits


  1. Saves time on manual renaming
  2. Improves file organization and readability
  3. Enhances collaboration by providing clear visual hierarchy
  4. Helps maintain consistency across design systems
  5. Makes it easier to identify and update layout structures
plugins.tagline: Essential keyboard shortcut to rename layers

plugins.name: Slice Creator
plugins.description:
✂️ Slice Creator Plugin -- USE FOR EMAILS (KLAVIYO)

Easily split any selected element into even horizontal slices! Perfect for layouts, grids, or exporting assets. 🎉


How to Use 🚀

  1. Select a single element on your Figma canvas.
  2. Enter the number of slices in the plugin.
  3. Hit Create Slices to generate slices instantly!

Features ✨

  1. Quick, precise horizontal slicing.
  2. Auto-selects and zooms into the slices.
  3. Simple and seamless integration.

Limitations ⚠️

  1. Works with one element at a time.
  2. Only creates horizontal slices.

🎯 Perfect for efficient, consistent slicing!

plugins.name: Mots AI
plugins.description:
Elevate your UI designs with this intelligent Figma plugin that generates smart, context-aware text tailored to your needs. Powered by advanced AI technology, it streamlines your content creation process, allowing you to quickly produce engaging copy for various UI components.


Seamless Integration:


This plugin seamlessly integrates with your existing Figma workflow. Simply highlight the text area in your design that requires content, specify the context, and select the appropriate UI component. It will generate customized, realistic text that perfectly complements your design, saving you valuable time and effort.


Intuitive User Experience:


Designed with user-friendliness in mind, this plugin boasts an intuitive interface that allows designers to focus on their creative process. It currently supports English language generation, with plans to expand language support in future updates. The plugin adapts to your needs, making it an indispensable tool for designers seeking to streamline their workflow and boost productivity.


How to use this plugin:


Select text area:


Highlight the text layer or frame in your Figma design where you need content generated.


Provide context:


Specify the context of your design, such as the user story and acceptance criteria, to ensure the plugin generates relevant and appropriate text.


Choose UI component:


Select the specific UI component (e.g., button, link) for which you need text.


Generate and refine:


Let the plugin work its magic. Review the generated text and, if needed, refine it to achieve the perfect fit for your design.


—



Got more ideas?


Send them our way at contact@juny.com


www.juny.ai
